pr_title: [NATS-Streaming] Fix issue in acknowledging messages in auto-ack mode

timeline.message:
Fix issue in acknowledging messages in auto-ack mode

Fixes https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/issues/20516

timeline.bodyText: Shall we make the error message like "Invalid operation, manual acknowledge is not supported in auto ACK mode."
timeline.author: daneshk
